subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Enrico Battaglin sprinted to victory on a tough uphill finish to claim the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia as the race hit the first of the high mountains.
snippet: Enrico Battaglin sprinted to victory on a tough uphill finish to claim the 14th stage of the Giro d’Italia as the race hit the first of the high mountains.
